body: Plz god let this have an english translation at some point in the future!

Even if im a yuri fan, ive must agreed with you guys, the anime isnt canon and the game dont show nothing that can be interpreted that way, but then again, this is a doujinshi and by consequence, this isnt canon too so... just enjoy it

@Z777 that dumpster fire of an anime adaptation isn't canon and does not exist, theres also zero romantic tension between Bel and Enty, only retarded yurif*gs infected with covid19 ship them, its forced alphabet people pandering garbage
@Helyous Did you watch the anime? Yuri content. Belfast x Enty, Kaga x Akagi etc
Why the hell is there so much Yuri
